# minnccaccess

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides access to the functions that make easier to read data, import data from Decennial Census and ACS, and plot maps for the Minnesota Child Care Access research team.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hktosun/minnccaccess")
```
